beer.name: Edgefield Wheat
beer.description: Edgefield Wheat is a classic example of an American wheat ale. Unlike the popular Northwest Hefeweizen, Edgefield Wheat is a bright, clear, clean tasting ale. The smooth flavor of wheat malt is highlighted and has become a favorite of light ale drinkers.
beer.grains: Pale Malt, Malted Wheat, Vienna Malt
